resources.string: Are you sure to clear data?
Please check your course list and timetable. Due to overlapping timetable, timetable table could not be generated.

Press "Add course" button to add courses. Fill in the course code and course group and press "Add course" button to add. 

The input text is case insensitive, it can work with lowercase as well. If failed, please check your input or check iCress web availability. Sometime, iCress page hangs and cause Minima unable to get course information. 

Long press on the timetable item to edit course name and swipe item to the left or right to delete the course. It will automatically delete related timetable too. 

Due to Minima will automatically find the faculty, you might need to check your course list. Sometimes, same course code and course group can exist in other faculty as well. Remove anything that is unrelated.

Timetable list depends on courses that you've added. Please add your course in "Course" section. 

Long click on timetable item to change the class venue. Click on "Recheck timetable online" button to recheck your registered course on iCress. 

Your course name will be preserved, but class venue will be replaced with the value returned by the iCress. This is due to course name is not part of iCress, but class venue is.

You can swipe up and down the timetable table view. 

The previous timetable table view is old and unmaintainable. With this version, timetable table view is upgraded into more simpler and maintainable library. 

To generate the timetable table view, you need to ensure that your timetable is not overlapping. You can fix overlapping timetable by deleting conflicting course. If it's out of your capability to fix the conflicting course, please use timetable list view instead. 

With this, timetable table view unable to export your timetable into any image format, at least for now.

Dear all, 

Minima developer always considers your feedback from time to time. Currently, Minima developer is not UiTM student anymore (but once did) and the developer could not give his full commitment. Sorry. 

This application will always be free (without ads!) and be unofficial so that Minima is free to try out new things. 

Feel free to give feedback, contribute or donate. The detail of the donation is on the Fionix Software page. 

Thank you for using Minima. Wishing you the best of luck on your studies.
[Minima] Hi! I\'ve my feedback for you

Title: Short brief of your feedback. 

Description: Your full feedback. 

Steps to reproduce (for report issue only): Clearly and chronologically (numbered list is recommended) 

Expectation (for report issue only): Explain how would you think it should behave / work. 

Platform info (for report issue only): Device full model (e.g. Google Pixel 4, Huawei Honor 8x, etc.).
